meanings.definition: Having a lively or spirited quality.
meanings.sent1: The puppy's playful and kicky behavior brought joy to the family.
meanings.sent2: Her colorful and kicky outfit stood out at the party.
meanings.sent3: The kicky music made everyone want to dance.
meanings.sent4: The kicky breeze lifted the leaves off the ground.
meanings.sent5: The kicky dance routine energized the audience.

meanings.sent1: The new shoes she bought were so kicky and trendy.
meanings.sent2: He always wears kicky hats that catch everyone's eye.
meanings.sent3: She felt kicky in her chic dress at the event.
meanings.sent4: The kicky accessories completed her look perfectly.
meanings.sent5: The kicky sunglasses added a cool touch to his outfit.

meanings.sent1: The kicky of the car startled the passengers.
meanings.sent2: He felt a kicky when the elevator suddenly stopped.
meanings.sent3: The kicky of the roller coaster made her scream with excitement.
meanings.sent4: The kicky of the gun made him drop it in surprise.
meanings.sent5: The kicky of the earthquake shook the entire building.
